explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning algorithms such as random forests (RF) and conditional inference tree (ctree) for forecasting power consumption.
explanations.supervised learning: The hybrid model developed in the paper uses supervised learning techniques like conditional inference trees and linear regression for forecasting.
explanations.regression: The paper explicitly mentions the use of linear regression as part of the hybrid model for forecasting power consumption.
explanations.decision tree: The paper uses conditional inference trees (ctree), which are a type of decision tree algorithm, as part of the hybrid model.
